Header: ASL at Trincomalee Opens its New Children’s Park
Content: The Army School of Logistics (ASL) at Trincomalee became further equipped on Tuesday (5) when it opened its children’s park, a long-felt need for children of students officers at ASL, including those belonging to foreign students. Brigadier W.G.D Wanniarachchi, Commandant, ASL, who was instrumental in building it in the ASL compound, together with the Deputy Commandant, several senior Officers, faculty members, permanent staff and students and teachers at ‘Janavijaya’ pre-school, Chinabay opened the new playground, equipped with swings, seesaw, merry-go-round, slides, etc.
